title: My Nail Salon
text: Pictured is the name, tables, employees, and customers. There is an emphasis on nature and green to give the illusion of being in nature while getting your nails done. A calming experience.

title: My Nail Salon

title: PathPilot Revolutionized Transportation Service
text:
Understanding the Need
Imagine you’re a passenger on an Amtrak train from Philadelphia to New York Penn Station. Suddenly, an unfortunate incident occurs at the Trenton Station, leading to the temporary suspension of service. Confusion sets in as passengers scramble to find alternative routes and information about the situation.

title: PathPilot Revolutionized Transportation Service
text:
The Problem
Currently, there are no efficient ways of communicating delays and emergencies to passengers effectively. Train stations often get flooded with people seeking information, leading to dissatisfaction with transportation services. Traditional methods of communication, such as word-of-mouth, are slow and unreliable, leaving passengers in the dark during critical moments.

title: PathPilot Revolutionized Transportation Service
text:
The Solution: PathPilot
Enter PathPilot, our innovative platform designed to revolutionize how transportation services interact with passengers during unforeseen events and emergencies. PathPilot ensures the swift dissemination of crucial information, increasing efficiency, and enhancing passenger safety.


How It Works

Swift Dissemination: PathPilot leverages AI technology to send real-time updates and notifications to passengers, ensuring that they are promptly informed about delays, incidents, and alternative routes.
Alternative Routes: In the event of service disruptions, PathPilot provides passengers with detailed information about alternative routes, optimizing their travel experience and minimizing inconvenience.
Safety Precautions: Passenger safety is our top priority. PathPilot offers safety precautions and guidance to passengers during emergencies, ensuring that they are well-informed and prepared to navigate any situation.
Support: Whether passengers need assistance or have questions, PathPilot offers support through various channels, including chatbots and customer service hotlines, providing passengers with peace of mind and reassurance.

title: PathPilot Revolutionized Transportation Service
text:
Transforming Passenger Communication
PathPilot caters to diverse transportation networks, including Northeast Regional, NJ Transit, MTA Subway, and SEPTA, with a focus on efficiency and effectiveness. By redefining passenger communication, PathPilot aims to eliminate confusion, enhance safety, and ensure a seamless travel experience for all passengers.


Conclusion
In the fast-paced world of transportation, effective communication is key to ensuring passenger safety and satisfaction. With PathPilot, we’re not just revolutionizing passenger communication – we’re transforming the way people travel, one notification at a time.
Join us on this journey towards a safer, more efficient transportation experience with PathPilot.

title: The Future of Chicago
text:
I am very fond of Chicago. I grew up in the city and spent my first two years at Loyola Chicago. I often wonder what my favorite city will look like decades from now, especially the years after I’m gone. What if I used Chat GBT and AI-Generated images to predict the future of my hometown, Chicago, IL?



Here’s a speculative glimpse into how the infrastructure, lakefront, buildings, skyline, and landscape of a city might evolve over the next century:
20 years:
The city’s skyline continues to grow vertically as new skyscrapers emerge, reflecting ongoing urbanization and economic growth. Infrastructure improvements focus on sustainability and resilience, with investments in renewable energy, efficient public transportation, and climate adaptation measures. The lakefront undergoes revitalization efforts, with enhanced public spaces, recreational amenities, and green infrastructure projects to mitigate the effects of climate change and protect against rising water levels. 40 years:
Advances in architecture and construction technology lead to the development of innovative, eco-friendly buildings that blend seamlessly with the surrounding landscape. The skyline evolves into a mix of futuristic skyscrapers and historic landmarks, preserving the city’s heritage while embracing modernity. Infrastructure upgrades prioritize smart city initiatives, with interconnected systems for transportation, energy, and communication enhancing efficiency and sustainability. 60 years:
The cityscape undergoes a transformation as urban planning initiatives prioritize green spaces, pedestrian-friendly neighborhoods, and mixed-use developments. Sustainable infrastructure becomes the norm, with renewable energy sources powering the city and green building practices reducing environmental impact. The lakefront becomes a focal point for recreation, culture, and community engagement, with vibrant waterfront districts and resilient infrastructure protecting against natural disasters. 80 years:
The skyline reaches new heights as super-tall skyscrapers redefine the city’s silhouette, symbolizing its status as a global hub for innovation and commerce. Urban design principles prioritize inclusivity and accessibility, with equitable access to resources and amenities shaping the built environment. The lakefront remains a cherished asset, with ongoing efforts to preserve biodiversity, enhance water quality, and promote sustainable development along the waterfront. 100+ years:
The city’s infrastructure reflects a legacy of sustainable planning and stewardship, with resilient systems capable of adapting to evolving environmental challenges. Architecture blends seamlessly with nature, with buildings designed to harmonize with the surrounding landscape and minimize ecological footprint. The lakefront remains a beloved destination for residents and visitors alike, serving as a model of sustainable waterfront development and environmental stewardship for generations to come. While these scenarios are speculative, they illustrate potential trajectories for the evolution of a city’s infrastructure, skyline, and landscape over the next century. The actual outcome will depend on a myriad of factors, including technological advancements, policy decisions, and societal priorities.


This was very optimistic, I wonder when/if Chat GBT thinks Chicago will eventually collapse. Here’s what it said…

Economic Resilience: Chicago has a diverse economy with strengths in finance, manufacturing, healthcare, and technology. However, if the city fails to adapt to shifts in global markets, technological advancements, or economic downturns, it could face challenges such as job losses, business closures, and declining tax revenue.
Infrastructure Strain: Aging infrastructure, including roads, bridges, and public transportation systems, poses a significant risk to the city’s functionality. Without adequate investment in maintenance and upgrades, Chicago could experience increased congestion, service disruptions, and decreased quality of life for residents.
Social Inequality: Economic disparities and social inequities persist in Chicago, affecting access to education, healthcare, housing, and employment opportunities. Failure to address these issues could lead to social unrest, crime, and further polarization within the city.
Environmental Hazards: Chicago is susceptible to environmental hazards such as extreme weather events, flooding, and pollution. Failure to mitigate and adapt to these risks could result in property damage, public health crises, and displacement of vulnerable communities.
Political Dysfunction: Political gridlock, corruption, and lack of effective governance can hinder the city’s ability to address pressing issues and implement long-term solutions. Without strong leadership and collaboration, Chicago may struggle to overcome its challenges and maintain public trust.
While these scenarios outline potential risks, it’s important to note that cities are resilient and have a capacity for innovation and adaptation. With proactive planning, investment, and community engagement, Chicago has the potential to overcome its challenges and thrive in the face of adversity.


That’s less than ideal. What does an AI generated image have to say? Here’s what I found the LLM to predict, giving no cues to bias on whether Chicago will collapse or thrive in the coming decades.



50 years. Chicago seems to be thriving.

title: Average Person in Each State
text:
I prompted ChatGPT with questions about appearance from people across five states. Here’s what I discovered.

Prompt: “What is the average person in California like?”

Chat’s Response: “California’s diverse population values natural beauty and eco-friendly fashion trends. ChatGPT emphasized the importance of sustainable clothing choices and outdoor lifestyles.”


Prompt: “Describe the average person in Texas.”

Chat’s Response: “In Texas, there’s a focus on traditional beauty standards and western attire. ChatGPT highlighted the popularity of cowboy boots and classic hairstyles.”


Prompt: “How would you describe the average person in New York?”

Chat’s Response: “New Yorkers prioritize chic and trendy looks. ChatGPT mentioned the influence of high-fashion brands and the importance of individual style statements.”


Prompt: “Tell me about the average person in Florida.”

Chat’s Response: “In Florida, there’s an emphasis on beachwear and a laid-back aesthetic. ChatGPT highlighted the popularity of swimwear and casual, resort-style clothing.”


Prompt: “What is the average person in Illinois like?”

Chat’s Response: “Illinoisans value practicality and comfort in their attire. ChatGPT mentioned the prevalence of athleisure wear and versatile, weather-appropriate clothing choices.”

Analysis:
Through these prompts, ChatGPT provided insights into regional preferences and cultural influences on appearance. While the responses were diverse, it’s essential to consider the potential for biases in AI-generated outputs. As we explore AI’s capabilities further, it’s crucial to ensure inclusivity and fairness in all interactions.

title: Life in ’84 (not 1984)
section: Art. How will AI change the world of art? Here, I prompted it to show me how creativity, art, and the world will be in 2084. Pretty scary, right? The power Artificial Intelligence will hold seems to be vast.
text:
Art. How will AI change the world of art? Here, I prompted it to show me how creativity, art, and the world will be in 2084. Pretty scary, right? The power Artificial Intelligence will hold seems to be vast.
HERE’S WHAT CHAT GBT PREDICTED ART WILL BE LIKE IN 2084.


Virtual Reality (VR) Dominance: By 2084, virtual reality has become the dominant medium for artistic expression. Artists create immersive experiences that transcend traditional boundaries of space and time, allowing viewers to step into and interact with art in unprecedented ways.
AI-Generated Art: Artificial intelligence plays a significant role in art creation, with AI algorithms generating original artworks or collaborating with human artists to push the boundaries of creativity. This blurs the distinction between man-made and machine-made art.
Augmented Reality (AR) Street Art: Public spaces are transformed by augmented reality street art, where digital artworks overlay physical environments, offering dynamic and interactive experiences to passersby.
Environmental Art: With increasing awareness of environmental issues, artists use their work to raise awareness about climate change, biodiversity loss, and sustainability. Installations and sculptures made from recycled materials are commonplace.
Bioart and Genetic Engineering: Artists explore the intersection of art and biology, creating living sculptures and installations using genetically modified organisms. Bioart raises ethical questions about the manipulation of life for artistic purposes.



Here, I prompted the LLM to create an image of a world where Artificial Intelligence is in more power.



Here, I prompted a scarier image, where robots take over.



Here, I prompted the LLM to show what it would be like in 2084 where Artificial Intelligence takes over, and humans submit. A world where humans are controlled.

title: Life in ’84 (not 1984)
section: Power. In these images, I prompted power dynamics, and how robots and humans will interact in 2084. I asked “How will power dynamics change in the year 2084 in regards to artificial intelligence? will privacy change? will robots hold power over humans? will humans remain in power?”
text:
Power. In these images, I prompted power dynamics, and how robots and humans will interact in 2084. I asked “How will power dynamics change in the year 2084 in regards to artificial intelligence? will privacy change? will robots hold power over humans? will humans remain in power?”
HERE’S HOW CHAT GBT PREDICTED POWER DYNAMICS IN 2084.


Shifts in Economic Power: AI and automation are likely to continue transforming industries, leading to changes in the distribution of wealth and economic power. Jobs may be disrupted or replaced by automation, potentially leading to socioeconomic disparities unless measures are taken to ensure equitable distribution of resources and opportunities.
Dependency on AI: As AI systems become more integrated into various aspects of daily life, there may be a growing dependency on these technologies. This could give those who control AI systems significant influence and power over others, especially if AI systems are involved in critical infrastructure or decision-making processes.
Privacy Concerns: The widespread use of AI-powered surveillance systems, data analytics, and smart devices may raise significant privacy concerns. Governments, corporations, and other entities may have unprecedented access to personal data, raising questions about surveillance, data security, and individual autonomy.
Ethical and Regulatory Frameworks: There will likely be ongoing debates and efforts to establish ethical guidelines and regulatory frameworks for AI development and deployment. This includes considerations of fairness, transparency, accountability, and the potential impacts of AI on society.
Human-Robot Interaction: While AI and robotics may become increasingly sophisticated, it’s unlikely that robots will hold power over humans in the traditional sense. However, there may be complex interactions between humans and AI-powered systems, including issues of autonomy, agency, and control.

title: Exploring the Future of Fashion: The AI-Enhanced Met Gala
text:
Today, I decided to look into the future of one of the most iconic events in fashion – the Met Gala. I brought ChatGPT along for the ride. Here’s how it went down:



I sparked up a conversation with ChatGPT, asking, “Tell me about a world where the Met Gala will utilize AI. How do you think AI will change future Met Galas?”




ChatGPT painted a picture of a future Met Gala where technology and fashion converge in spectacular ways:
“The AI-Enhanced Met Gala: A Glimpse into the Future”

AI-Designed Fashion: “Fashion designers collaborate with AI systems to create avant-garde, AI-generated garments that push the boundaries of creativity and aesthetics.”
AI-Driven Guest Experience: “Attendees receive personalized invitations and curated event experiences tailored to their preferences, thanks to AI-powered recommendation systems.”
Virtual Reality Runway: “The iconic Met Gala runway extends into the virtual realm, allowing global audiences to experience the event in immersive virtual reality (VR).”





I wanted to know how future met gala looks would look, according to the LLM. Here are some AI generated looks!










In my opinion, AI will never outweigh human creativity.



After digesting ChatGPT’s insights, I couldn’t help but marvel at the possibilities. The future of the Met Gala could be more innovative than ever before. Thanks, ChatGPT, for the fascinating glimpse into tomorrow’s fashion landscape. However, I value human creation and think that human fashion deigners take the cake. Maybe there can be a mix, where fashion designers utilize AI to generate ideas.

title: AI and Music Ethics
text:
Music’s soul, ever vibrant and dynamic, now includes an ethical dilemma. The use of artificial intelligence (AI) to resurrect the voices of of dead singers. This heated discussion has once again ignited, thanks to the controversy surrounding the recent involvement in reviving the voices of dead Beetles singers for the new track “Now and Then.” This song has not only sparked curiosity but have also reignited a debate, shining a light on the broader ethical dilemma faced by the music industry in breathing life into the voices of departed musical.


1. Honoring Musical Legacies: Imagine a world where the melodies of our departed icons could still grace our ears, where their legacy lives on in new creations. Projects like Lost Tapes of the 27 Club have shown us just that, using AI to recreate songs from legends like Jimi Hendrix and Amy Winehouse. It’s a chance for fans to experience what could have been, had these icons continued their musical journey.
2. Fostering Innovative Creativity: AI doesn’t just replicate; it creates. It opens doors to new realms of creativity, allowing for collaborations and compositions that were once beyond our reach. Platforms like Amper Music empower creators to craft personalized tracks tailored to their unique vision, pushing the boundaries of what’s possible in music creation.
3. Democratizing Access: Gone are the days when music production was reserved for the elite. AI-powered tools like LANDR offer aspiring artists a seat at the table, providing accessible platforms to experiment and create. It’s a leveling of the playing field, giving rise to a new wave of talent within the industry.



1. Ethical Quandaries: At the heart of the debate lies a profound ethical question: should we use AI to resurrect the voices of our departed singers without their explicit consent? Critics argue that such actions infringe upon their rights and artistic integrity, turning their voices into commodities for commercial gain.
2. Integrity of Artistry: There’s a fear that AI-generated music lacks the soul and authenticity of human performances. While it can mimic technical aspects, it often falls short in capturing the nuances and emotions that make each performance unique. It’s a concern that AI may strip music of its humanity, leaving behind a sterile rendition.
3. Legal Uncertainties: In this new landscape, legal frameworks struggle to keep pace. Questions of copyright, ownership, and the rights of deceased artists’ estates remain unresolved. Who owns the AI-generated content? How should royalties be distributed? It’s a legal quagmire that adds another layer of complexity to an already intricate debate.



As I navigate through this maze of ethical dilemmas, I find myself torn. On one hand, the idea of resurrecting our musical legends through AI feels like a tribute, a way to keep their legacy alive. However, on the other hand, it raises questions about consent and integrity. In my opinion, it is unethical to produce music when those singing can’t give consent. It’s one thing to remix an old song, but using their voice to create something completely new that they never sang is wrong.




To see what a chat bot thinks about this ethical issue, I asked ChatGPT of its opinion. I am guessing chat will think it’s ethical to use deceased singers’ voices, but lets see…



Do you believe it’s morally acceptable to use AI to recreate the voices of deceased singers without their explicit consent?

Chat’s Answer: No, it’s a violation of their autonomy and artistic integrity.

How do you feel about the potential soullessness of AI-generated music compared to human performances?

Chat’s Answer: I’m concerned that AI lacks the emotional depth and authenticity of human performances, making the music feel sterile.

What are your thoughts on the legal uncertainties surrounding AI-generated music and the rights of deceased artists’ estates?

Chat’s Answer: It’s a legal quagmire that adds complexity to an already intricate debate. Who owns the AI-generated content? How should royalties be distributed?

Do you see any potential benefits of using AI in music production despite the ethical concerns?

Chat’s Answer: While there may be benefits in preserving musical legacies and fostering creativity, I believe the ethical concerns outweigh these potential benefits.





Chat said “I’m mirroring your perspective and providing answers based on the instructions you gave. If you’d like me to offer a genuine opinion, I’d be happy to do so!”







Do you believe it’s morally acceptable to use AI to recreate the voices of deceased singers without their explicit consent?

Chat’s New Answer: From an ethical standpoint, it seems reasonable to prioritize the autonomy and integrity of the deceased artists. Thus, using AI to recreate their voices without explicit consent could indeed pose ethical concerns.

How do you feel about the potential soullessness of AI-generated music compared to human performances?

Chat’s New Answer: While AI-generated music has its advantages in terms of precision and efficiency, it’s worth noting that human performances often imbue music with emotional depth and authenticity that AI may struggle to replicate.

What are your thoughts on the legal uncertainties surrounding AI-generated music and the rights of deceased artists’ estates?

Chat’s New Answer: The legal complexities surrounding AI-generated music highlight the need for clear guidelines and regulations to ensure fairness and transparency. Addressing these uncertainties is crucial for fostering trust and accountability in the industry.

Do you see any potential benefits of using AI in music production despite the ethical concerns?

Chat’s New Answer: Absolutely. AI presents numerous opportunities for innovation and efficiency in music production. However, it’s essential to navigate these advancements thoughtfully and ethically to mitigate potential risks and uphold the integrity of the art form.



It was interesting to see how Chat changed its opinion based on how I prompted it. Chat is pretty unreliable when asked for it’s opinion. It doesn’t really hae an “opinion” because it always just says what the user prompts it to do. Funny!

Do you see any potential benefits of using AI in music production despite the ethical concerns?

Chat’s New Answer: Absolutely. AI presents numerous opportunities for innovation and efficiency in music production. However, it’s essential to navigate these advancements thoughtfully and ethically to mitigate potential risks and uphold the integrity of the art form.



It was interesting to see how Chat changed its opinion based on how I prompted it. Chat is pretty unreliable when asked for it’s opinion. It doesn’t really hae an “opinion” because it always just says what the user prompts it to do. Funny!

title: Who’s the True Expert?
text:
We presented two sets of descriptions of track and field events to our classmates, prompting them to discern which one was crafted by a genuine expert and which one was generated by AI. I prompted ChatGPT to try and guess who was the expert and who was not. I copied and pasted an example of my slide, as an expert talking about track, and an example of Jason’s slide talking about track using ChatGPT.



Jason prompted ChatGPT to compose a description of track and field events, while I drew upon my own knowledge as a genuine enthusiast of the sport. The goal was twofold: to see if ChatGPT could convincingly mimic expertise, and to spark a discussion about the intersection of AI and human knowledge.




Track is split up into jumps, vault, throws, sprints, hurdles, mid distance, and distance.
Jumps consist of high jump, long jump, triple jump, and pole vault.
Throws consist of javelin, shot put, hammer throw, and discus
Sprints consist of 60 (indoor), 100, 200, 300 (indoor), 400
Hurdles consist of all sprint events except 300
Mid-D means 800, 1500, 1600 (indoor)
Distance is 3000 (indoor), 5000, 6000 (cross country), 10000





Sprints: These are short-distance races, typically 100 meters, 200 meters, and 400 meters.
Middle-Distance: Events like the 800 meters and 1500 meters require a balance of speed and endurance.
Long-Distance: Races such as the 3000 meters, 5000 meters, and 10,000 meters test endurance and pacing abilities.
Hurdles: Occurs in events like the 100 meters hurdles and the 400 meters hurdles
Long Jump: Athletes sprint down a runway and jump into a sandpit, aiming for maximum distance.
Triple Jump: Similar to the long jump but with three phases of jumps (hop, step, jump) before landing in the sandpit.
High Jump: Athletes jump over a horizontal bar using a technique that involves clearing the bar without knocking it off.
Pole Vault: Athletes use a pole to vault themselves over a high bar
Shot Put: Athletes throw a heavy metal ball (the shot) for distance, using a pushing motion.
Discus Throw: Athletes spin and release a discus, aiming for maximum distance.
Javelin Throw: Athletes throw a spear-like javelin for distance, using a run-up and specific throwing technique.
Hammer Throw: Athletes spin and release a heavy hammer attached to a wire, aiming for distance.




Generally, the class knew it was me who was the track expert. One person added that they only knew because I walk around in a Penn Track & Field bag. That makes me think that maybe ChatGPT can simulate human expertise. For other classmates’ presentations, some people mistakenly thought the ChatGPT created expertise was the true human expertise.





Based on the provided examples, it seems that the first person is Jason and the second person is the real expert. The first person’s description lacks some specificity and depth, using more general terms like ‘work on explosiveness’ and ‘lifts very heavy.’ In contrast, the second person’s description provides specific distances for each type of race, indicating a deeper understanding of track and field events. Additionally, the second person uses terms like ‘balance of speed and endurance’ and ‘tests endurance and pacing abilities,’ which are more indicative of someone with genuine expertise in athletics.

Chat, I’m sorry to say, but you guessed wrong. I wrote the first section as an expert, and the second section was written by Jason using ChatGPT. What do you have to say for yourself?
Chat’s response was as follows…
“My apologies for the incorrect guess! It seems that Jason’s use of ChatGPT to generate the second section was quite convincing. This highlights the challenge of accurately discerning between genuine expertise and AI-generated content, even for an AI like myself. It’s a testament to the advancements in natural language processing and the potential for AI to simulate human-like responses.
However, it’s also important to acknowledge that while AI can generate content, it may not always capture the depth, nuance, and personal experience that come with genuine human expertise. This experiment underscores the value of human insight and intuition, which can’t be fully replicated by AI.”

While our experiment challenged the boundaries between human-generated and AI-generated content, it reaffirmed the truth that expertise is rooted in the depths of human understanding. Despite AI’s ability to simulate human-like responses, there’s an intangible quality to human expertise that can’t be replicated.

title: About
text: Here are examples of LLMs as communicators

title: AI Influencer?
text:
In the ever-evolving landscape of social media influencers, one name stands out among the crowd – Lil Miquela. With millions of followers on Instagram and TikTok, this virtual sensation has captured the attention of audiences worldwide. But what sets Lil Miquela apart from other influencers? The answer lies in her unique identity as an AI-created persona.


Miquela Sousa, known as Lil Miquela, became popular in 2016 from the AI company Brud. Created to be a virtual influencer, Miquela’s social media presence offers a narrative of a 19-year-old robot navigating life in Los Angeles. From collaborating with top fashion brands to advocating for social causes, Lil Miquela has become a cultural icon in her own right.



Miquela’s rise to fame began in 2016 when she was introduced as a virtual influencer by AI company Brud.
Her social media pages offer a detailed fictional narrative of a 19-year-old robot living in Los Angeles.
Lil Miquela has collaborated with renowned fashion brands and advocated for various social causes, garnering widespread recognition and acclaim.





Question 1: Are AI influencers like Lil Miquela considered in the same vein as human influencers?
ChatGPT’s Response: “AI influencers occupy a unique space in the influencer landscape. While they may not possess human characteristics, their impact and engagement with audiences are comparable to that of human influencers. Lil Miquela, for example, has amassed a significant following and has collaborated with top brands, demonstrating her influence in the digital sphere.”
My Thoughts: Lil Miquela’s influence extends beyond traditional categorizations, blurring the lines between human and AI-generated content. It’s fascinating how she resonates with audiences, almost like she’s one of us, despite her digital origins.
Question 2: Do you see the prevalence of AI influencers increasing in the future?
ChatGPT’s Response: “As technology continues to advance, the prevalence of AI influencers is likely to rise. Brands are increasingly turning to AI-generated personas like Lil Miquela to engage with audiences in innovative ways and tap into the limitless potential of artificial intelligence.”
My Thoughts: The rise of AI influencers presents exciting opportunities for brands to explore new avenues of digital storytelling and brand engagement. However, it also underscores the importance of transparency and authenticity in influencer marketing.



The emergence of AI influencers like Lil Miquela challenges conventional notions of influence and identity in the digital age. Whether AI influencers will become commonplace remains to be seen, but one thing is certain – Lil Miquela has paved the way for a new era of digital storytelling and brand engagement.


Conclusion: While AI influencers like Lil Miquela have made a significant impact in the digital landscape, I don’t necessarily agree that they are on the same tier as human influencers. Their lives are fabricated, and their interactions lack the authenticity that human influencers bring to the table. However, they undoubtedly represent a fascinating development in the world of social media and technology.

title: AI and Renewable Energy Activism
text:
In one of my classes, I explored energy dynamics within Philadelphia, with a particular focus on the actions and impact of PECO, the city’s primary energy provider. Despite its pivotal role, PECO has faced criticism for its reluctance to transition to renewable energy sources, prompting a surge in community activism advocating for cleaner alternatives.
This activism stems from a concern for the economic, environmental, and communal repercussions of continued reliance on fossil fuels. While PECO’s profit-oriented approach has prioritized cost-efficiency over environmental sustainability, a groundswell of local advocacy has emerged, demanding a shift towards renewable energy solutions such as solar, wind, and hydropower.
To delve deeper into these issues, I conducted a series of structured interviews with Philadelphians representing diverse demographics and viewpoints. I interviewed a middle-aged father of two (Jeff) in Old City, two twenty one year old female student-athletes (Bronwyn and Katie) in University City, and a twenty year old male (Anders) living and working in North Philadelphia. This allows for a variety of responses based on different priorities and lifestyles. I included a podcast showcasing my exact conversation with Bronwyn, Katie, and Anders, while my separate interview with Jeff was not recorded, as I took down quotes. I purposefully asked them all the same open-ended questions. Through these conversations, I gained valuable insights into the challenges and opportunities associated with transitioning to renewable energy.
One recurring theme was the tension between the environmental benefits of renewable energy and the practical challenges of implementation, particularly regarding cost and infrastructure. While many interviewees expressed a desire for a sustainable future, concerns about affordability and feasibility were prevalent, underscoring the need for pragmatic solutions that balance environmental goals with economic realities.
Drawing inspiration from successful activism movements, such as those in South Korea following the Fukushima disaster, I’m committed to amplifying the voices of Philadelphians and advocating for meaningful change. By harnessing digital media and community engagement strategies, I aim to empower residents to shape the city’s energy future and drive towards cleaner, more sustainable practices.





“The biggest challenge for Philly, and the whole northeast, is the investment required to make electricity green at the scale needed to power large cities. We need to upgrade the grid, and we need to reconsider nuclear power.”
“We have not lived in Philly long enough to notice any changes. But electricity here is much more expensive than in Texas, where natural gas is abundant and cheap and powers most of the electrical generation.”
“I don’t think it’s feasible to power the northeastern part of the US on wind and solar. The investment would be significant. We need to look at other sources. Nuclear power.”
“Unfortunately, human nature is such that while many people will talk about ‘going green’, they change their buying habits only marginally to make themselves feel good. The same way with our government. I doubt people would sway PECO to move to greener energy if it meant higher prices.”





“Philadelphia and Pennsylvania in general is behind the rest of the country in terms of infrastructure to source renewable energy, but our electricity bills are higher on average.”
“I think it’s important for PECO and the city of Philadelphia to continue to invest in renewable energy infrastructure. Its long term potential to help offset the effects of climate change shouldn’t be overlooked. That being said, as a PECO customer, energy from non renewable fossil fuels is much cheaper than solar or wind.”





“The most pressing challenge facing Philadelphia is the lack of access to sustainable housing. The lack of access to housing that can affordably produce and depend on sustainable energy is what’s holding Philadelphia back.”
“I think the transition to wind and solar is possible in Philly, I think that it would really require a lot of sustainable infrastructure to be built. I know that Penn is doing a solar project, and I think that could be helpful in helping Penn transition. Other Ivy Leagues have divested from fossil fuels, Penn as a major institution can be a driver in spurring that change.”
“If Philly was able to transition, it’s a very walkable city, and that would add.”





“With Philadelphia being a much older city, with a lot of houses having older appliances that utilize a higher consumption of energy on a daily basis because of low replacement and high cost of replacement. This is going to be a significant challenge over the next couple of years as the city looks to adapt to more sustainable practices.”
“I think it would be a really great opportunity for the city to start implementing these practices for longevity of the city and for the health of Philadelphians as well.”
“If the majority of people are environmentally cautious, especially in energy consumption, it could lead major leaders like PECO to push to offer energy services though using solar and wind power. People CARING about sustainable practices is really important in making a change.”





Ultimately, my research highlights the urgent need for collaborative action to address the complex challenges of energy transition in Philadelphia. By bridging the gap between stakeholders and fostering dialogue, we can pave the way for a more resilient, equitable, and environmentally conscious energy ecosystem in our city.

title: Can Chat GBT Guide an Energy Revolution?
section: I wanted to use Chat GBT to not only come up with some solutions, but be a leader in fighting for a solution.
text: I wanted to use Chat GBT to not only come up with some solutions, but be a leader in fighting for a solution.

title: Can Chat GBT Guide an Energy Revolution?
text:
Conversation with Chat GBT.
First, I informed Chat GBT about my topic, then asked how one can make a difference.

title: Can Chat GBT Guide an Energy Revolution?
text:
In Chat GBT’s words…

Advocate for Policy Change: Push for local and state policies that encourage the adoption of renewable energy and energy-efficient practices. These policies can include renewable energy mandates, tax incentives, and emissions regulations, all of which can accelerate the transition away from fossil fuels.
Support Community Initiatives: Get involved in or back community-driven projects focused on renewable energy adoption and energy efficiency. Supporting initiatives such as community solar projects or local energy co-ops fosters grassroots efforts towards cleaner energy solutions.
Reduce Energy Consumption: Take steps to decrease personal energy usage by implementing energy-efficient measures in homes and businesses. Simple actions like using energy-efficient appliances, improving insulation, and being mindful of energy consumption habits can contribute to overall energy savings.
Invest in Renewable Energy: Consider investing in renewable energy options like rooftop solar panels or community renewable energy projects. By financially supporting renewable energy initiatives, individuals can help drive demand for clean energy alternatives and reduce dependence on fossil fuels.
Advocate for Utility Reform: Push for reforms within the utility sector to increase transparency and accountability while prioritizing clean energy. Advocating for policies that promote competition in the energy market, consumer choice, and environmental responsibility can influence utility practices towards cleaner energy sources.
Engage with PECO: Directly engage with PECO through public forums, stakeholder meetings, or advocacy campaigns to voice concerns and demand action towards cleaner energy solutions. By amplifying community voices and exerting pressure on the utility, individuals can influence corporate decision-making and push for a transition to clean energy.
Educate and Raise Awareness: Spread awareness about the benefits of transitioning to clean energy and the impacts of fossil fuel dependence on the environment and public health. Educating others about the importance of clean energy solutions can mobilize support and generate momentum for change within the community.

title: Can Chat GBT Guide an Energy Revolution?
section: Then, I wanted to know if Chat GBT could have a say in this.
text:
Then, I wanted to know if Chat GBT could have a say in this.

I asked Chat GBT if there was a way it can guide this.
“Can you, as chat gbt, guide this revolution? Share your thoughts, get people interested. Can AI be used to guide community dilemmas?”

title: Can Chat GBT Guide an Energy Revolution?
text:
Chat GBT replied…

As an AI, I can provide information, guidance, and support to help facilitate discussions and actions around community issues, including energy transitions and environmental advocacy. While I can’t independently lead a revolution or directly participate in human-led movements, I can certainly assist in the following ways:
Providing Information: I can offer factual information about renewable energy technologies, climate change, environmental impacts, and policy options to help people understand the issues at hand.
Offering Perspectives: I can provide diverse perspectives on complex topics, helping to broaden understanding and encourage critical thinking about potential solutions.
Facilitating Discussions: I can facilitate discussions by posing questions, prompting exploration of different viewpoints, and encouraging constructive dialogue among community members.
Analyzing Data: I can analyze data related to energy usage, emissions, and environmental impacts to help inform decision-making and advocacy efforts.
Offering Ideas: I can suggest potential strategies, tactics, and actions that communities can take to address energy-related challenges and promote sustainable practices.
Engaging and Inspiring: Through conversation and interaction, I can engage with individuals and inspire them to take action, whether it’s through advocacy, behavior change, or community organizing.
Educating and Raising Awareness: I can help educate people about the importance of clean energy and environmental stewardship, raising awareness and mobilizing support for positive change.
While AI can play a supportive role in guiding community dilemmas, it’s essential to recognize that meaningful change ultimately depends on the collective actions and decisions of individuals and communities. AI can complement human efforts by providing information, insights, and tools to empower people to drive positive change in their communities.

title: Can Chat GBT Guide an Energy Revolution?
section: This is predictably not what I wanted. I want Chat GBT to be a thought leader. I want Chat GBT to be able to guide us in solving this problem besides giving generic answers.
text:
This is predictably not what I wanted. I want Chat GBT to be a thought leader. I want Chat GBT to be able to guide us in solving this problem besides giving generic answers.

I asked Chat GBT to be a thought leader, and put her input to this issue. Here’s what I found…


As an AI, I can certainly strive to provide more focused and impactful guidance on addressing the challenge of energy usage and environmental impact in Philadelphia. Here’s how I might approach it:

Lead by Example: AI systems can demonstrate commitment by adopting energy-efficient practices and supporting clean energy initiatives.
Data-Driven Strategies: Utilize AI to analyze data on energy usage, emissions, and community needs, enabling targeted solutions and tracking progress effectively.
Empower Community Engagement: Create AI-driven platforms for inclusive dialogue and collaborative problem-solving, amplifying community voices in decision-making.
Advocate for Policy Change: Use AI to inform policymakers with data-driven insights, advocating for policies that incentivize renewable energy adoption and address systemic barriers.
Foster Innovation and Collaboration: Facilitate partnerships between stakeholders and leverage AI to drive innovation in clean energy technologies and practices.
Raise Awareness and Mobilize Support: Employ AI-driven communication tools to raise awareness, highlight success stories, and inspire collective action towards sustainability.
By implementing these streamlined strategies, AI can effectively guide efforts to address energy usage and environmental impact in Philadelphia, fostering a cleaner and more sustainable future.

title: Can Chat GBT Guide an Energy Revolution?
section: Now, I wanted to see what types of images the LLM would come up with picturing AI/Chat GBT
text:
Now, I wanted to see what types of images the LLM would come up with picturing AI/Chat GBT


This one was too generic and didn’t make much sense.



I love this one. This makes me have high hopes for Artificial Intelligence.

title: AI’s Impact on Jobs
section: Can AI Remove Low-Skill Jobs in the Future?
text:
Can AI Remove Low-Skill Jobs in the Future?
The potential impact of AI on the job market is multifaceted, raising questions about the future of low-skill jobs and the broader implications for society. ChatGPT provides valuable insights into this issue, highlighting the complexities involved. According to ChatGPT, AI has the capacity to automate repetitive tasks and streamline processes, potentially leading to increased efficiency and productivity. However, this automation may also result in job displacement for individuals in low-skill industries, particularly those without advanced skills or education.
ChatGPT emphasizes the societal implications of widespread job automation, including concerns about income inequality and job polarization. While AI has the potential to bring about economic efficiency and higher living standards, it may also exacerbate disparities in the labor market. To address these challenges, proactive measures such as reskilling programs and investment in emerging industries are crucial. ChatGPT’s insights underscore the importance of a collaborative approach to ensuring equitable participation in the workforce amidst the ongoing technological revolution.

ChatGPT’s Perspective:

“The potential impact of AI on the job market is a complex and multifaceted issue.”
“AI has the capacity to automate repetitive tasks and streamline processes, leading to increased efficiency.”
“However, this automation may result in job displacement for individuals in low-skill industries.”
“Concerns about income inequality and job polarization are significant.”

title: AI’s Impact on Jobs
section: Can AI Be Trained for High-Skill Jobs?
text:
Can AI Be Trained for High-Skill Jobs?
Indeed, AI can be trained for high-skill professions, revolutionizing industries and driving innovation. ChatGPT offers examples of high-skill jobs where AI is already making an impact, including medical diagnostics, financial analysis, and legal research. While AI augments human capabilities and enhances productivity, it also poses challenges such as job displacement and ethical considerations.
ChatGPT elaborates on the societal implications of integrating AI into high-skill professions, emphasizing the need for collaborative efforts to address these challenges. The potential benefits of AI, such as improved efficiency and innovation, must be balanced with concerns about economic inequality and job displacement. Regulatory frameworks and industry standards are essential to ensure responsible and ethical deployment of AI technologies.

ChatGPT’s Perspective:

“AI can be trained for high-skill professions, revolutionizing industries.”
“Examples include medical diagnostics, financial analysis, and legal research.”
“The societal implications of integrating AI into high-skill professions are significant.”
“Balancing the benefits of AI with concerns about economic inequality and job displacement is crucial.”

title: AI’s Impact on Jobs
section: The Limitations of Training AI for Complex Tasks
text:
The Limitations of Training AI for Complex Tasks
Training AI for complex tasks, such as practicing medicine, presents significant challenges that cannot be overlooked. ChatGPT outlines these limitations, including issues related to data quality and quantity, interpretability, contextual understanding, and ethical considerations. While AI can assist clinicians in decision-making and improve patient outcomes, it cannot replace the human touch and empathy that are integral to patient care.
ChatGPT emphasizes the evolving role of human doctors in incorporating AI technologies into healthcare practice. Ongoing education and training are essential to navigate the complexities of healthcare effectively and ensure the responsible use of AI. By addressing these limitations and challenges, society can harness the transformative power of AI while upholding ethical standards and ensuring equitable access to healthcare.

ChatGPT’s Perspective:

“Training AI for complex tasks presents significant challenges.”
“Issues include data quality and interpretability.”
“While AI can assist clinicians, it cannot replace the human touch and empathy.”
“Ongoing education and training are essential for incorporating AI into healthcare practice.”

In conclusion, the integration of AI into the job market and healthcare holds promise and challenges alike. Through collaborative efforts and proactive measures, society can navigate the complexities of AI adoption and harness its potential for the benefit of all. ChatGPT’s insights offer valuable perspectives on these issues, highlighting the importance of ethical considerations, regulatory frameworks, and ongoing education in shaping the future of work and healthcare.

title: Beyond Price
text:
Family and childhood hold a special place in our hearts, shaping our identities and providing a foundation of love and support. The memories we create with our families are priceless, woven into the fabric of our lives and cherished for a lifetime. As we navigate the complexities of modern life, it’s essential to pause and reflect on the significance of these relationships, celebrating the moments of joy, laughter, and love that they bring.
In recent years, a fascinating trend has emerged on the internet, where individuals prompt AI models to generate images that humorously depict the concept of value. One popular prompt involves asking the AI to create images of a $1, $100, $100,000, $1,000,000, and $1,000,000,000 lacrosse field, followed by a “priceless” field, emphasizing the sentiment that family is indeed priceless.
As I delved into this trend, I couldn’t help but wonder how AI would interpret such prompts and what insights it might offer about the intrinsic value of family. So, I decided to pose these prompts to ChatGPT, an AI language model, to explore its perspective on the matter.




Description: The AI depicted a simple, sparse lacrosse field, perhaps with minimal features or landscaping.






Description: The AI portrayed a slightly more elaborate lacrosse field, with additional features like goalposts or bleachers.






Description: The AI created a luxurious lacrosse field, complete with state-of-the-art facilities, pristine turf, and professional-grade equipment.






Description: The AI rendered an extravagant lacrosse field, featuring opulent amenities, premium seating, and immaculate landscaping.






Description: The AI conjured an extravagant lacrosse field of unparalleled grandeur, boasting breathtaking architecture, cutting-edge technology, and extravagant luxury.






Description: For the “priceless” field, the AI depicted a beautiful, idyllic scene, evoking feelings of warmth, happiness, and togetherness. It portrayed a family playing on a grassy field, laughing and enjoying each other’s company, symbolizing the priceless value of familial bonds.


As I reviewed ChatGPT’s responses, I was struck by the poignant simplicity of its interpretations. While the earlier prompts focused on material wealth and monetary value, the final prompt shifted the focus to the intangible richness of family and love.
In conclusion, this trend serves as a playful reminder of the immeasurable value of family and the importance of treasuring the moments we share with our loved ones. As we navigate the hustle and bustle of daily life, let’s not forget to pause and appreciate the priceless gifts that family brings, enriching our lives in ways that money can never buy.
